update PERSONAL_LOAN_IOU_CONTRACT_INFO
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_NAME = #{borrowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NUM = #{cardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_LOCATION = #{signLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LOAN_CYCLE = #{loanCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LENDING_BANK = #{lendingBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
